_readme.staleAfterHours: Mark tracker data stale after this many hours (shows warning in panel). 0 = never stale.
_readme.autoStaleSessionMinutes: Treat an active session as stale (show Waiting instead of Busy) after this many minutes. 0 = disabled.
_readme.requireHandoffOnEndSession: When true, End Session forces a handoff note when hot files are detected.
_readme.automation.endSessionZeroTouch.enabled: Feature flag for mostly zero-touch End Session automation. Off by default for rollout safety.
_readme.automation.endSessionZeroTouch.autonomy: Automation profile label. Current supported value: mostly_full_auto.
_readme.automation.endSessionZeroTouch.copyPromp: When true, generated handoff prompt lines are offered for clipboard copy in interactive End Session.
_readme.automation.endSessionZeroTouch.maxSummar: Maximum deterministic summary length before truncation.
_readme.automation.startSessionZeroTouch.enabled: Feature flag for zero-touch Start Session automation. When enabled, detects queued handoffs and pre-fills the session goal.
_readme.automation.startSessionZeroTouch.autoCla: When true, automatically claims the best queued handoff without prompting. Requires enabled=true.
_readme.automation.startSessionZeroTouch.promptP: When true and autoClaimHandoff=false, pre-fills the goal input with the handoff summary for user confirmation.
_readme.automation.handoffRoutingDefaults: Default routing map keyed by source agent id (claude/codex/copilot). Used to auto-draft handoffs.
_readme.commands.build: Shell command to run as the build health check on End Session (for example, 'npm run build'). No shell operators (&&, |) - use a script file instead.
_readme.commands.test: Shell command to run as the test health check on End Session (for example, 'npm test').
_readme.commands.deploy: Shell command to run as the deploy health check on End Session (for example, 'npm run deploy'). Leave empty to skip.
